scope.title: Control Input
scope.description: Control inputs help users input one or more selections from multiple options. Our control inputs consist of checkboxes and radio buttons.

data.title: Control Input
data.description: Control inputs help users input one or more selections from multiple options. Our control inputs consist of checkboxes and radio buttons.
